title: Cloud Resume Challenge
description: Static resume website deployed to cloud storage + CDN.
body:
# Cloud Resume Challenge

This project implements the Cloud Resume Challenge as a static website:

- HTML version of my resume
- Deployed to cloud object storage (e.g. AWS S3)
- Served globally via a CDN
- Uses modern frontend tooling (Vite + React)

The goal is to demonstrate cloud fundamentals (networking, storage, CDN) together with basic frontend skills.
